# Wyrwood Race Traits
## Overview
**Wyrwood Race Traits**

Only wyrwoods can select these traits.


| **Trait** | **Source** |
|---|---|
| Burn-Proof | Book of Heroic Races: Advanced Wyrwoods (Jon Brazer Enterprises), pg. 6 |
| Hardwood Fists | Book of Heroic Races: Advanced Wyrwoods (Jon Brazer Enterprises), pg. 6 |
| Woodwise | Book of Heroic Races: Advanced Wyrwoods (Jon Brazer Enterprises), pg. 6 |

**Source:** Book of Heroic Races: Advanced Wyrwoods (Jon Brazer Enterprises), pg. 6
